title: Sha Po Lang (2005) XVid Eng.Subs
description:
Sha Po Lang

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Genre: Hong Kong martial arts action
Language: Cantonese with English subtitles
Release:2005 (released in the USofA as "Kill Zone")

Plot Summary: Chan, a senior detective (Simon Yam) is nearing the end of his career and is desparate to put behing bars a ruthless crime lord Po (Sammo Hung).  Brought in to replace Chan is a martial arts expert (Donnie Yen) with a different approach to policing.

Qi Sha (Seven Killings) is the Power Star;
Po Jun (Army Breaker) is the Ruinous Star;
Tan Lang (Greedy Wolf) is the Flirting Star;
Together, these three stars, with their changes, 
could create or destroy your beautiful life.

Cast: Donnie Yen, Sammo Hung, Simon Yam and Jacky Wu.
Director: Wilson Yip
